title: 服务器报错,无法连接到BukkitDev
author: 纯_冰
txt_content:
[19:45:17 信息]: [ProtocolLib] The updater found an update: 4.4.0 (Running 4.0.2). Download at https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/protocollib.1997/
[19:45:19 信息]: [PlaceholderAPI] 128 placeholder expansions are available on the cloud.
[19:45:22 警告]: [HolographicDisplays] Could not contact BukkitDev to check for updates.

replies.author: 纯_冰
replies.txt_content:
Mgazul 发表于 2018-12-20 20:01
把更新检测关了就行了
怎么关呢
